author: Hank Berrien
description: On the heels of a tragic shooting in Utah that claimed the life of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk, Stephen A. Smith took a rare detour from his usual sports commentary to deliver a sobering message on humanity, unity, and the role sports must play in a fractured America. “We saw this man speaking … and we saw ...
title: ‘Shame On You’: Stephen A. Smith Condemns Those Celebrating Charlie Kirk’s Death

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: Missouri Republicans sent a new congressional district map to the desk of Governor Mike Kehoe on Friday. The map is expected to create one more Republican-favored congressional district in the deep red state. The Senate passed the map 21-11 on Friday after the House passed the same map earlier in the week. President Donald Trump ...
title: Missouri Republicans Pass Map To Send ‘Additional MAGA Republican To Congress’

author: Ben Shapiro
description: When people say “political violence is wrong,” does that change the underlying substructure of thought that leads to a massive elevation in violence in the country of the political variety? I don’t think it means anything to just say that political violence is wrong, because there are actual substrates of thought that lead to the ...
title: Saying ‘Political Violence Is Wrong’ Doesn’t Go Far Enough

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem has cut over $30 million in “frivolous and unnecessary” government grants and contracts in the last three weeks, the Department of Homeland Security told The Daily Wire.  The department said that it had cut a total of $31,692,166 in spending between August 22 and September 12. The savings were from ...
title: Noem Cuts $30 Million In ‘Frivolous’ Homeland Security Spending In Three Weeks

author: Andrew Klavan
description: I grew up in an age of assassinations. The President, John F. Kennedy, was gunned down in 1963, when I was nine years old. His brother, Robert Kennedy, was killed five years later, little more than a month after I saw him at a campaign event in my home town. That was the same month ...
title: In America, Violence Arises When Cultural Power Shifts

author: Virginia Kruta
description: Actor Charlie Sheen was recording a conversation for podcast host Joe Rogan’s next episode when they learned about the assassination of conservative commentator and Turning Point USA founder Charlie Kirk on Wednesday afternoon. Rogan and Sheen were both clearly taken aback, shaken by the news — and both immediately assumed that the shooting had been ...
title: ‘He Doesn’t Deserve That’: The Moment Charlie Sheen, Joe Rogan Learned Charlie Kirk Was Dead

author: Zach Jewell
description: An Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officer was injured in Chicago on Friday after an illegal immigrant struck him with a vehicle. The suspect was killed in the incident. A team of ICE agents was conducting “targeted law enforcement activity” at Franklin Park when a suspect was asked to stop his vehicle, but continued to ...
title: Illegal Immigrant Shot And Killed After Wounding ICE Agent In Chicago

author: Amanda Harding
description: Daily Wire podcast host Michael Knowles made an appearance on “Fox News @ Night” on Thursday to discuss the impact of Charlie Kirk’s assassination on our nation. Host Trace Gallagher asked Knowles to react to a comment that Director of Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard made comparing Kirk’s assassin to the terrorists who attacked the United States ...
title: Michael Knowles Reflects On Why Charlie Kirk’s Death Feels So ‘Profound’ For People

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: Utah Republican Governor Spencer Cox said Friday that the assassination of Charlie Kirk could be a “turning point” on whether the country would embrace free and open debate or turn to political violence.  Cox made the comments during a press conference announcing that 22-year-old Tyler Robinson had been arrested for the murder of Kirk on ...
title: ‘An Attack On All Of Us’: Utah Governor Calls Kirk Assassination A ‘Turning Point’ For The Nation

author: Amanda Harding
description: Avowed leftist author Stephen King was forced to admit his error and apologize after being caught spreading lies about slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk. As other “progressives” on social media tried to justify the brutal assassination of Kirk at a free speech event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday, King piled on by sharing a ...
title: Stephen King Walks Back Lie About Charlie Kirk With Half-Hearted Apology

author: Zach Jewell
description: Federal and state officials in Utah revealed on Friday morning that they closed in on Tyler Robinson, the 22-year-old man suspected of assassinating Charlie Kirk, after a family friend reached out to law enforcement. FBI Director Kash Patel said that authorities “made historic progress for Charlie” after capturing the suspected assassin in just 33 hours. ...
title: TIMELINE: How Authorities Circled In On Suspected Assassin Tyler Robinson

author: Amanda Harding
description: President Donald Trump stopped by “Fox & Friends” Friday morning to do a studio interview and share updates on the capture of Charlie Kirk’s alleged killer. During the course of the conversation, the president related a personal anecdote about what Kirk meant to his youngest son, Barron. “He was very hurt when he saw this. ...
title: Trump Shares Touching Story Of Barron Wanting To Meet Charlie Kirk

author: Zach Jewell
description: Utah officials and the FBI confirmed during a press conference on Friday morning that the man suspected of assassinating conservative commentator Charlie Kirk was taken into custody on Thursday night. Utah Republican Governor Spencer Cox said at a press conference that 22-year-old Tyler Robinson was arrested after allegedly confessing or implying to a family member ...
title: Authorities Arrest, Identify Suspected Charlie Kirk Assassin

author: Hank Berrien
description: Rep. Jasmine Crockett (D-TX) ignited outrage during a House Judiciary Committee markup when she referred to Kayla Hamilton — a 20-year-old autistic woman raped and murdered by an MS-13 gang member who entered the country as an unaccompanied minor — as a “random dead person.” 🚨 DISGUSTING BEHAVIOR: Rep. Jasmine Crockett just called Kayla Hamilton, ...
title: Jasmine Crockett Dismisses MS-13 Murder Victim As ‘Random Dead Person’

author: Zach Jewell
description: President Donald Trump announced on Friday morning that the National Guard will be deployed to crime-ridden Memphis, a Democrat-run city in deep-red Tennessee. “We’re going to Memphis. I’m just announcing that now,” Trump told “Fox & Friends” during an interview in the studio. “National Guard and anybody else we need, and by the way, we’re ...
title: Trump Announces Next ‘Deeply Troubled’ American City National Guard Will Clean Up

author: Zach Jewell
description: Cheers erupted for President Donald Trump at Yankee Stadium on Thursday night, as he was in attendance for the game on the 24th anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attacks. The Yankees recognized the 9/11 anniversary before the game, and welcomed “back to Yankee Stadium the 45th and 47th president of the United States,” showing the ...
title: Cheers Erupt For Trump At Yankee Stadium On 9/11 Anniversary

author: Morning Wire
description: The manhunt for Charlie Kirk’s assassin continues, as reports indicate the ammunition used was etched with pro-transgender and anti-fascist phrases. The legacy media faces intense backlash for its response to Charlie Kirk’s murder, with some commentators blaming the victim for his own assassination. On the 24th anniversary of 9/11, Secretary of War Pete Hegseth lays ...
title: Morning Brief: Manhunt For Charlie Kirk’s Killer, Backlash To Media Coverage, 9/11 ‘Call To Action’
